p.4: Must have at least 6 months of professional Experience with ML and OCR.
p.7: Our client is looking for a creative mind to support the resolve of critical production issues by helping to reduce expenses and product cost through the use of OCR. As a Software Developer, you should be able to work independently and with other team members. You should be able to design, develop, test and deploy applications using a preferred Object Oriented Language.

li: Learn and master the OCR product for development and support.
li.1: Should follow the OCR SDLC process.
li.2: Should have a working knowledge of version source control software.
li.3: Should have a working knowledge of web services, third-party integration using APIs.
li.5: Experience in scheduling jobs and queues.
li.7: Experience in writing optimized, performance database SQL queries.
